remarks: The support of a function which has the same zero values (in its domain) as another function is a subset of the support of this other function. (Contributed by AV, 30-Apr-2019.)
statement:
suppfnss $p |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ B e. V /\ Z e. W ) ) -> ( A. x e. A ( ( G ` x ) = Z -> ( F ` x ) = Z ) -> ( F supp Z ) C_ ( G supp Z ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d Z x $.
